column4: now i have only 2 partitions: swap and root, how can i move "home" to a new partition?
mount /dev/hdXN /mnt; cp -a /home /tmp/; rm -rf /home/*; umount /mnt; mount /dev/hdXN /home (some caution advised)
is there a web site where i can learn to do that?
probably, but I have no particular suggestions.  Perhaps a good book on Unix?
